movie.title: The Woman Who Left
movie.description_intro: After 30 years of wrongful imprisonment, a woman plans to take revenge on her former lover.
movie.description_full: After 30 years of wrongful imprisonment, a woman plans to take revenge on her former lover.

movies.title: Love Notes
movies.summary: Follows the relationship between a classical music critic and a country music star after a one night stand, which results in an unplanned pregnancy.
movies.description_full: Follows the relationship between a classical music critic and a country music star after a one night stand, which results in an unplanned pregnancy.
movies.synopsis: Follows the relationship between a classical music critic and a country music star after a one night stand, which results in an unplanned pregnancy.

movies.title: Lover Girl
movies.summary: Jake is a 16-year-old girl whose mother left her. She finds her older sister Darlene in L.A., but Darlene turns her away. Darlene's neighbor Marci takes pity on Jake, allowing her to stay over. When Jake discovers that Marci is a manager in a massage parlor, she convinces Marci to hire her.
movies.description_full: Jake is a 16-year-old girl whose mother left her. She finds her older sister Darlene in L.A., but Darlene turns her away. movies.title: Totsunyûseyo! Asama sansô jiken
movies.summary: When radicals from Japan's Red Army took a woman hostage in the resort town of Karuizawa, Nagano in 1972, Officer Atsuyuki Sassa was put in charge of diffusing the situation. But the task had its challenges. Upon arriving in mountainous Nagano, Sassa had to compete with freezing winter temperatures, conflicting opinions between the Tokyo Metropolitan Police and the Nagano Prefectural Police, as well as public opinion to gain entrance to the lodge that held the single woman captive.

movies.title: The Man Who Cheated Himself
movies.summary: Rich Lois Frazer, divorcing her fortune-hunter husband, finds he's bought a gun. Suspecting he plans to kill her, she calls in her lover, who just happens to be Homicide Lieutenant Ed Cullen. When Ed arrives, the gun gets used...and because of his relationship with Lois, Ed is compelled to compound a felony. The good news: Ed himself is assigned to the case. The bad news: Ed's hotshot younger brother Andy, a new- minted detective, is also on the case...and anxious to prove himself.
